category_profile.definition: Innate physical or spiritual conditions determined at birth. They can be a curse (terminal illness) or a blessing (genius talent).
narrative_role: The 'Time Limit' constraint for a character (must find a cure before age 20).
The justification for the Protagonist's rapid growth (1 year of training = 10 years for others).
The catalyst for conflict (factions fighting to secure a person with a rare body).

cursed_meridians.description: Meridians are blocked or severed by overflowing energy. Usually leads to early death unless cured.

list.name: 구음절맥 (Nine Yin Severed Meridian / 九陰絶脈)
list.effect: Body freezes from inside. If cured/unlocked, possesses infinite Yin internal energy.
list.cure: Requires 'Extreme Yang' elixirs (e.g., Ten Thousand Year Fire Fruit).

list.name: 구양절맥 (Nine Yang Severed Meridian / 九陽絶脈)
list.effect: Body burns from inside. High fever. Opposite of Nine Yin.

list.name: 천절맥 (Heavenly Severed Meridian / 天絶脈)
list.effect: Meridians are naturally cut. Cannot practice martial arts initially, but if connected, becomes the strongest vessel.

divine_bodies.type: Sin-che / Seong-che (Divine/Sacred Body / 神體/聖體)
divine_bodies.description: Bodies blessed by the heavens. Born geniuses.

list.name: 무신체 (Martial God Body / 武神體)
list.effect: Instantly understands any martial art upon seeing it once. Perfect muscle memory.

list.name: 도태체 (Taoist Womb Body / 道胎體)
list.effect: Natural affinity with Nature/Tao. Internal energy regenerates automatically.

list.name: 만고독체 (Ten Thousand Poison Body / 萬蠱毒體)
list.effect: Immune to all poisons. Blood itself is a deadly poison. Often created artificially by the Tang Family or Demonic Cult.

list.name: 금강지체 (Diamond Body / 金剛之體)
list.effect: Bones and skin are hard as steel naturally. Great for Shaolin arts.

spiritual_bones.type: Sin-gol / Gi-gol (Divine/Strange Bones / 神骨/奇骨)

list.name: 통천다맥 (Heaven Connecting Multi-Meridian / 通天多脈)
list.effect: Has wider meridians than normal people, allowing massive Qi flow.

list.name: 선골 (Immortal Bone / 仙骨)
list.effect: Destined to become an Immortal. Ageless appearance.

narrative_usage.awakening: A cursed body (Jeol-maek) is cured by a protagonist, transforming the curse into a massive power source.
narrative_usage.tragedy: A loved one has a terminal constitution, forcing the protagonist to venture into dangerous regions (like North Sea or Nanman) to find a cure.
